content.rendered:
Directed by Sourabh Shrivastava.

Written by Amal Donwaar. Prakash Jha. Sharad Tripathi.

Cast Arshad Warsi(Bhola). Saurabh Shukla(Murari Chaurasia). Flora Saini(Shraddha). Sara Loren(Payal). Varun Badola(Badri). Deepali Pansare(Sunita). Nivedita Tiwari(Mala). Preeti Sood(Preeti). Parag Tyagi(Chandani’s husband). Anangsha Biswas(Astha). Amanda Rosario(Item Girl (as Amanda)). Elli Avrram(Chandani) . Kanchan Awasthi(Namita). Mohit Balchandani(Young Bhola). Parul Bansal(Shristhi). Mohammad Salman Khan(Salman). Rachna Khanna(Basanti). Faisal Malik(Inspector). Nikshay Maurya(Goons). Bhavna Pani(Chanda (as Bhawana Pani)). Sandeep Patil(Train man). Vikash Rajput(Vikash Rajput). Sharad Singh(Pandit).Sourabh Srivastava. Piyush Suhane(Dulare).Mihika Verma

Language Hindi.

Producers Syed Zaid Ali. Kanishk Gangwal. Disha Jha.

Production PLAY Entertainment. Prakash Jha Productions. Zeal Z Entertainment services.
